snippet.title: Guardian Tactics: Deck of the Chosen | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
👉 Wishlist on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2862500/Guardian_Tactics_Deck_of_the_Chosen/
🎮 Discord - https://discord.gg/nWFEPzndne

⚡️Guardian Tactics: Deck of the Chosen, developed by Urnique Studio, is a single-player roguelike deck-building card game where players command a squad of guardians in a thrilling deckbuilding, roguelike card battle to save the world from an Android army invasion. Fight, fall, learn, and rise again!

#GuardianTactics #RoguelikeDeckBuilding #Roguelike #CardGame #IndieGame #Steam #UrniqueStudio #IndieGameStudio 

📍 Follow Guardian Tactics:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Guardiantacticsgame
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/Guardianttgame
